The ability to setup 4 cameras around your home and have a surveillance system in your pocket is AWESOME...The build quality on the hand held could be a little better in terms of hardware...but I think the WORST part is the software on the hand held is very lack luster and does not respond to the users actions properly...it is slow at best.  This is the only reason that this product gets a 4/5 from me...fix the software/firmware on the hand held and its a 5 star product.This is a GREAT effort and an excellent product with many possibilities..but make sure your expectations are set correctly and you wont be disappointed.  4/5 stars for me.

Reviews.Title: I am impressed!
Reviews.Author: Nathan A. Edwards
Reviews.Content: My experience with video baby monitors is limited to one purchased about six years ago which, up until I received this product, I believed was the greatest thing since sliced bread. The Lorex "Snap" monitor is, as of the writing of this review, the greatest thing since sliced bread as far as video baby monitors are concerned. With the knowledge that all I can reasonably compare it to is an outdated model, I would like to explain why I am so impressed.After opening the box, my first impression left me feeling that the screen on the monitor is too small. Having now utilized the product, I can confidently say that the screen is the perfect size. That is, the field of vision covers more than enough area and the smaller screen allows for true portability, which leads me to the next positive. This product is truly portable. While the camera/cameras can be mounted to a wall (and easily removed), the design allows for set up on any flat surface. The monitor itself is about the size of a large cell phone and, with its convenient charging port and seemingly long battery life, can be brought just about anywhere due to its wireless operation. The camera also provides a great picture even when the lights are turned off and it automatically transitions into night vision.All of these points certainly make this product great but, in comparison with the old model, there are three features that really impress me. The first being the fact the audio monitor is two way. With the touch of a button on the handheld monitor, crystal clear audio can be heard through the camera just as well as it is being received. Another big advantage, to me, of the Lorex monitor is that it allows room for growth, enabling up to four cameras to be monitored on the same handheld device. While I have only utilized one camera with this unit, I like the fact that I have options if I need them. The final deal sweetener is a still photo function that saves spur of the moment images onto a removable memory card in the monitor. All in all, the Lorex "Snap" is a great product that I would recommend to anyone in the market for a video baby monitor.

Reviews.Title: Video baby minitor
Reviews.Author: Karla Pou
Reviews.Content: The product is well package, it looks fine but the camera connector was broken. Never got to use this product and i could not file a claim because there is no option for this in the amazon website.Have not tried to call Customer Service, I wrote a message to them a couple of month ago, have not receive an answer yet.

Reviews.Title: Love this thing, no signal problems at all!  **UPDATED**
Reviews.Author: melissa davis
Reviews.Content: I have a 2500 sq foot (one story) house and I wanted a video monitor that I could carry around to any room (or down to the mailbox) and not lose signal.  I've had various audio baby monitors, which I liked, but they always crackled way too much, and obviously I couldn't see what my daughter was doing.  I did a lot of research before buying a video monitor because I heard awful things about other video monitors losing signals within a few yards of the camera, so I was pleasantly surprised when I got this one set up that I did not have any audio crackling problems or issues with losing the video signal.I don't really use the picture capture feature and I haven't called customer service yet, so I can't speak about those things, but what I can say is that what this monitor is really supposed to do, it does it well.  I love that the monitor is small and wireless (about the size of an ipod), and having the two-way audio will be nice if I need to use it as an intercom when my daughter gets older.The only thing I would change is, while it's nice that the camera is able to bend and move in almost any direction, it's not easy to position the camera in a useful position without mounting it using the screw mount on the back.  Once we solved this problem, though, by mounting it to the side of the crib and pointing down slightly, we have had no further issues with any part of the monitor.The battery life doesn't last forever, but it does last pretty long, depending what power saver setting you have the screen on.  I also like that I can have the audio monitor on all night and then just click on the video screen when I want to check on her.  The volume settings are appropriate, and, as long as you plug the monitor into the dock at night (exactly like charging an ipod shuffle), you won't have a problem with the battery.Overall, 8.5/10... if it broke tomorrow, I'd buy another one right away.UPDATE:  Okay so about a month ago, the power cord for the camera broke (probably my daughter's doing) and I was, sadly, without a video monitor for a few weeks.  I called Lorex and, after being on hold for a while, I got a guy (who was in Canada and spoke perfect English) on the line who told me the product had a one year warranty and if I would fax him a copy of my proof of purchase and a brief description of what exactly I needed, he'd send out a new cord right away.  I faxed it at the end of the day on a Friday and then called back on Tuesday to make sure they got the fax.  After a much shorter hold time, I got a different guy who looked up my account and said the cord was already in the mail and would be there in about 7-10 business days.  It came about 6 business days later, however the cord did not work.  I think, when the first cord broke, a little piece of metal got stuck in the camera preventing the camera from working.  I was going crazy without having the video monitor (my two-year-old just discovered getting out of bed 10 times a night), so I bought a new camera from Amazon at my own expense, figuring when I warranty the old camera, I'll just have two.  The new camera paired with the old monitor very easily and worked perfectly.Overall, I'm pretty impressed with Lorex's customer service, particularly in light of all the negatives said about them on Amazon.  I wish they would have express-shipped the cord to me so I didn't have to wait as long, but they still got it to me within their timeframe.  I'm still very happy with this product!

Reviews.Title: Liked it as long as it worked
Reviews.Author: Todd Kennedy
Reviews.Content: We went through 2 of these, each lasting 3-4 weeks.  The first time the "female" hookup for the charger/base broke off in the receiver and headed to the interior of the unit and rattled around in there. Unable to charge it any longer, there was nothing to do but return it.  Our prompt replacement by Amazon made it no better than 4 weeks.  The receiver, sitting on the kitchen counter, began beeping and saying that the video could not be detected.  Then the rattling again.We've found the camera quite useful (we only use audio on occasion, as we can hear our son pretty clearly anywhere in our small house); the picture is more than adequate, reception good, etc. Battery life is less than impressive, but not a big deal.But our latest South Asian customer service representative says that the receiver is likely to fail again (and the reason we found such a good deal on it??) and wants to refund rather than replace. We're going to acquiesce.Caveat emptor.

Reviews.Title: very susceptible to noise - beware
Reviews.Author: ak
Reviews.Content: This unit has good features and good video definition but it is exceptionally susceptible to interference from other radio frequency devices as well as noise on your power lines from other devices plugged in around the house. The interference noise is amplified and makes using the audio portion of this device unbearable. I would definitely avoid this device if you plan on using the audio feature. I was not able to find a solution and Lorex, the manufacturer suggested I send it back to where I purchased it from. To be fair this has happened with another audio baby monitors I have used but not to this degree, rendering it unusable.

Reviews.Title: A word about the night vision...
Reviews.Author: R. Sardena "crewj"
Reviews.Content: My wife and I bought this to replace a  Safety 1st Prism Color Video Baby Monitor, Black. Unfortunately, the Lorex had to go back. Here's why:On the first night we put our daughter to bed with the camera, she wakes up, stares into the camera and starts to scream. We run up to the room and look at the camera but don't notice anything. We look right into the camera and realize that in order for it to see in the dark, the LEDs around the camera need to glow red. I would freak out if something above me was looking right at me with a circle of glowing red lights.

Reviews.Title: Good product awful customer service
Reviews.Author: Domestic Engineer "Sarah F."
Reviews.Content: I received this camera as a gift. When we received the camera and set it up to became clear that something was wrong with our kit. The monitor would not pick up a signal beyond ten feet. I called tech support and got amazing help. He told me that the antenna had not been calibrated correctly and they would send me a new kit (since they didn't know if it was the camera or monitor). He told me to email the proof of purchase (which I was able to get from my father who bought it) and email to customer service, and that they would process it and send me a new camera.I called customer service 4 days later and the women whom I spoke with was rude and abrupt and didn't really listen to me, but jumped to conclusions about why I was calling. She told me to email the proof of purchase directly to her since she didn't know who got the general emails. I asked her to please let me know when the camera would be mailed, I also asked her again in the email I sent. I did not hear anything back. I called again after a few days someone told me that they had mailed the new set and I should receive it in a few days.I'm still waiting for the new set, but from what I saw from the old kit the picture is great and the sound is just fine. I'm really looking forward to using this camera, I just wish that their customer service was a little more friendly and helpful.

Reviews.Title: Not The Best, But Gets The Job Done....
Reviews.Author: Daniel V. Reilly
Reviews.Content: Our Son was 18 Months old when we started using the Snap Video Baby Monitor. Prior to that, we were using an audio-only monitor. We use it mainly to keep tabs on him when he's napping or sleeping, since those are the only times that we're not there with him, and his crib is like a fortress, so we weren't afraid of him climbing out. As you can tell, our needs were fairly simple, and the Snap Video Baby Monitor met them quite nicely. The video quality is nothing to write home about...in fact, there were times when I couldn't distinguish between Mikey and a stuffed animal, so if this were a case where I had to keep a close eye on a baby, like to see if he was breathing or moving, I probably would go with a higher-resolution camera. The audio quality is good, and the night-vision never failed to make me think my Son was starring in a preschool version of PARANORMAL ACTIVITY. Not a bad product, if your needs are fairly simple and straightforward. If not, I'd shop around for a higher quality monitor.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: W. AT "WAT"
Reviews.Content: We bought this camera system and have used it for both of our kids. The picture isnt HD or anything, but its a good quality picture of your kids and the speaker system and communication system works great. We had one problem with the monitor in 2 years and sent it back to the company and they fixed it and after 3 years it finally died but it had been plugged in and on for 3 years. At that point we figured our kids did not need us to spy on them each night.We have recommended this to all our friends with kids. Many have bought other systems and been disappointed after looking at ours. Even the newer version of this product is not as good as this version.

Reviews.Title: CHEAP and already broken
Reviews.Author: Brittany Smith
Reviews.Content: CHEAP, Cheap, Cheap!I needed 3 video monitors in 3 different rooms, which limits my purchasing options. The Lorex Live Snap baby monitor was a horrible decision. First of all, the chords that plug into the video portion are cheaply made and dangerous. 2/3 video monitor chords have already broken. So now I'm down to only one video monitor. The chord can so easily be pulled out and wires and little bits of metal fall out and be pulled out.  Secondly, this has bad range, and when the video is out of range with the hand held parent part, then it beeps continusouly till it is back in range or you turn the entire thing off.A waste of over $300 (when added together to get all 3 video cameras)

Reviews.Title: worst baby monitor ever
Reviews.Author: anthony neppl
Reviews.Content: Broke within 3 months. do not buy not worth the money nor the effort to purchase. Bought as a daily deal,

Reviews.Title: Not just for human babies!
Reviews.Author: pam wilson
Reviews.Content: I purchased this item a few years ago, it worked great for awhile. However, I started noticing an issue with the sound, it would crackle or be distorted. At times now,  the audio doesn't work at all! But the camera has been knocked over multiple times and still works well. We've used this camera in our barn while one of our horses was expecting a baby. The reception was sketchy, had to walk out on the porch with the monitor but it beat walking to the barn in the dark at 2 am! But for indoor use,mostly, I have been pleased!

Reviews.Title: Good, not great.
Reviews.Author: Nicholas Dean
Reviews.Content: The picture and sound quality were good. Some of the other features didn't meet our expectations. The noise detection feature was inconsistent; at times it would turn on when our daughter was sound asleep, and not turn on when she was crying.

Reviews.Title: Would you buy this if the warranty were worthless?
Reviews.Author: JF
Reviews.Content: I have two young children, and I really liked this monitor while it worked.  A few years ago it had features that really no other monitor had.  As others pointed out, the snapshot feature is a joke, but it turns out the construction quality is the real killer.  The plastic shell is a bit cheap, and the circuit board isn't mounted inside the shell very well, which makes for a pretty fragile video monitor.  After sinking a fair bit of money into this system, Lorex's terrible customer service has made me regret every penny.So the full story is that I have actually bought this product twice - once a few years ago through COSTCO and once 8 months ago through Lorex (with only one camera).  I liked the monitor while it was working, though at this point, there are alternatives with all the same features and more.  The first video monitor stopped working last spring, so I quickly bought a new one on the Lorex site.  The USB connector of that video monitor broke  last month after ~6 months of normal use, which was a little disappointing.  The real kicker has been that Lorex customer service has been the worst customer service experience I have ever had, which is saying something... I thought AT&T; would surely be reigning champion there. :-)Almost  a month ago I called Lorex customer service to ask for a replacement as soon as possible.  I spent a good chunk of time with them on the phone.  They took my credit card information to place a hold charge so they could send a replacement immediately, and they would remove the charge once they received my old unit.  They said they would email shipping instructions for the old unit.  After the phone call, they did absolutely nothing.  No email, no shipment, no charge on the credit card.  I waited 3 weeks for some sign of life.  I submitted an online ticket a week ago, which has also been completely ignored.  I called today a couple of hours ago, and after finally getting a customer service representative on the line, she put me on hold but must have accidentally sent me to voice mail.  I left call back information, but have gotten no response.There are great alternatives on the market now to this monitor.  You take a gamble if you buy a Lorex product.  If you have an issue, you will have a hard time getting any help.  It was pretty disruptive for my kids to not be able to use the monitor to communicate with us like they were used to.  Knowing that is an issue, I'm surprised Lorex doesn't care more about taking care of their customers.The product when working probably merits 3 or 4 stars for its ease of use.  The customer service easily brings it down to 1.

Reviews.Title: Great customer service
Reviews.Author: BCgalinCO
Reviews.Content: This is a great monitor and the company has great customer service.Sound and picture are great, even after a few years of use.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Luis A. Goncalves R "USA outside"
Reviews.Content: Great product.  Great quality.  Great . . . and.. Great!  We just Love it!  Very Very usefull, even whit my 2 years boy!!

Reviews.Title: Great concept.
Reviews.Author: Rina F. Payne "RealPayne"
Reviews.Content: Bought two of them and one of them has already lost a camera. The resolution for this day and age is a little short but better than just volume.

Reviews.Title: Lorex lw2003 live snap Video baby monitor
Reviews.Author: Ruth M. Reed
Reviews.Content: It helps keep tabs on what is going on in the living areas in our home  Thank you very much

Reviews.Title: PRODUCT AND CUSTOMER SERVICE ARE BOTH FANTASTIC!
Reviews.Author: Dali "Dali"
Reviews.Content: We have had this monitor for over 2 years.  With my first child we had a Summer infant monitor and it was a piece of junk...always a lot of static and barely made it to my oldest daughter's 2nd birthday before crapping out all together.  We did some research and decided to go with this one, as we planned on hooking up an additional camera (but never did).  This monitor is fantastic.  The picture is clear, we never have issues with it, battery life is decent when removed from the charger.  I have taken it across the street to our neighbors driveway a few times and can still see and hear my little one.  The talk-back feature is awesome, and we have many times been able to calm an upset child by just saying a few words through the monitor without having to go in the room.Last week, the place where the monitor connects to the charger broke loose inside the monitor, so that we could no longer charge the monitor. I contacted Lorex to see if I could pay to get it repaired (they only have a 1-year warranty so it is out of warranty).  They responded within 24 hours and are sending me a whole new monitor for $30.  Way beyond my expectations, and excellent customer service.  Lorex has a loyal customer in me and I tell people regularly how much we love this monitor.

Reviews.Title: It doesn't work at all!
Reviews.Author: fclark
Reviews.Content: This doesn't even work with anything more than a weak signal when you stand with the monitor right next to the cameras.  It continues to say "Camera not detected" once we get about 10 feet away from the camera.  There is no support with Lorex which I had seen in the reviews, but hoped that I wouldn't have problems to need the support and now I don't know what to do.  Money down the tube.

Reviews.Title: Very good!
Reviews.Author: Ana
Reviews.Content: very good camera!! it works very well, even when it's dark...the sound is very clear and it has a great camera!!

Reviews.Title: Nice product but serious quality issues.
Reviews.Author: kgk
Reviews.Content: We've had these for two years.  The worked really well and had great features.They get 2 stars because they have quality issues that I think could be solved easily with a little attention.The first camera gave out after about 6 months as the electrical connector is pretty flimsy and just dropped off one day.  The monitor just died, again because of really flimsy electrical connectors.  It was sitting in the base charging station, and the charging pin connector broke off in the monitor.  The set is useless after 2 years and will now be thrown away.

Reviews.Title: Good concept, poor design
Reviews.Author: sn2000
Reviews.Content: This is my second Lorex baby monitor I have purchased. The connecting adapter, in the monitor, to charge the battery has broken on both monitors. This is a very poor design, I would not recommend purchasing this monitor. Also, customer service is poor, being placed on hold for an hour is not what I would consider good customer service. Bottom line look elsewhere this monitor is not worth purchasing.

Reviews.Title: Died after only having it for less than a year
Reviews.Author: Meredith Henderson
Reviews.Content: I bought this after hearing great reviews.  I have only been using it for about 6 months, and it already no longer charges.  Not fun when you buy something that you expect to last at least a year. (even though it should last years!)

Reviews.Title: Charging port broke- twice- and horrible customer service.
Reviews.Author: bcass
Reviews.Content: For the most part I was happy with this monitor and how it functioned.  It loses battery power fast, but I think most monitors do, so I can deal with it.Then my first one broke after 18 months, the port where you charge it came dislodged.  It was past the year warranty, so I was out of luck in getting it replaced, etc.  I was willing to give Lorex the benefit of the doubt that it was just one bad apple, so I purchased another one, and even bought a second camera when I had my second baby.  This one broke after 6 months of use, in the exact same way.  I am done with Lorex.  I have purchased a new monitor of another brand and am trying to get a refund.  I am getting the run around, and consistent with my previous customer service experience with Lorex, it is extremely hard to get a hold of somebody and get your problem addressed.

Reviews.Title: Good View, Nice Features, Poor Docking Design
Reviews.Author: Kristen Simpson
Reviews.Content: I loved the features of this video monitor.  I could clearly see my son. I liked the portability.  The sound was great.  But it quickly broke when trying to dock it, and their customer service department is non-existent.  So, if you're really careful not to break it while docking it, great! But if you break it, you have to buy another.

Reviews.Title: Inconsistent performance.
Reviews.Author: Go Blue 99
Reviews.Content: This monitor was great for approximately 24 hrs.  It came ready to use right out of the box. Just plug in the camera and set up it up. Quite a cinch. The next night it decided to 'unpair' and would not stayed paired after repeated trials. Customer Service was not at all helpful in advising to do the same thing over and over again, yet, no resolution was achieved. This product may have been a lemon but already owning a more superior product precluded exchanging it to try again.When it did work, the portability was great. Very crisp screen - day and night, crystal clear audio, easy to navigate menu options and the snapshot recording was pretty nifty. The product comes with a microSD card, which is pretty convenient to start recording your little one's shenanigans.  All in all, even if you are lucky enough to get a working version of this monitor, there are far better and reliable options available out there.

Reviews.Title: BEWARE of Lorex. missing parts, broken items, won't refund or replace.
Reviews.Author: Anthony Selking
Reviews.Content: I purchased a system from Lorex and when I opened the box, it was missing parts, so Lorex said that I had to purchase $50 worth of parts (power cord, remote control & mouse) to make it work. Yes... those items should have been in the box (as stated on the box). After buying the parts and plugging it into an outlet, it did not work. Lorex does not want to replace or refund it. I have been fighting with Lorex for over a year about this. I went to Wal-Mart and purchased a system that I installed and had working in just a few minutes. Save your time & money, go to Wal-Mart and get a different system (not made by Lorex). I wish that someone would have warned me about Lorex and they way they treat customers.Also, if you have a problem with Lorex products, you are told to submit a (claim) ticket on-line. After they can't or better yet "won't" help, they cancel your ticket and if you want to continue to fight them, you have to submit another ticket. Like I said, I have been fighting with them for over 1 year (they cancel my tickets)... do you want to do that to?????????????????? Just thought I would help.

Reviews.Title: Decent Deal
Reviews.Author: Spamm
Reviews.Content: We have owned this for a little over a year now. I bought when we found out we were expecting our second child. Buying a system with 2 cameras was cheaper than buying a second camera, at the time. It seems rather cheaply made. The SD card/taking pictures feature is a joke, and I have yet to figure out to delete the pictures the camera manages to take on its own at random. It does not always turn on when the baby makes a noise, most generally I hear the baby before the monitor kicks on, therefore the VOX doesn't work. All parts seem to be pretty cheaply made, the camera, the monitor cradle, and at times the buttons on the monitor just don't work. It is nice from time to time to be able to just peek in on the kids, but its not really proved to be worth its money.

Reviews.Title: Would NOT recommend. Look elsewhere for your monitor needs
Reviews.Author: vnd26
Reviews.Content: I'm extremely regretting the purchase of this monitor.  We've had this monitor for less than 2 years and it has broken twice (same issue both times). Like many other reviewers, the adapter for the power plug broke not only once but TWICE!! The first time it broke, it was still under warranty. We had it for only a few months. Lorex replaced it. However, the same thing has happened once again.  So, now our monitor is unable to charge and is useless.  It is ridiculous that we've seemed to run into the same malfunction.  I wound definitely NOT recommend purchasing this monitor.

Reviews.Title: Don't buy it, you'll regret it...........
Reviews.Author: carl4tide
Reviews.Content: Purchased this unit initially from SamsClub.com couple of years ago........keeping this short and simple, the charging port broke off inside of the unit rendering it unrepairable.  Purchased replacement one because we already had multiple cameras to pair with it, lasted about 2 days and wouldn't charge. Returned it and got third unit..........guess what- screen went solid white, no display.  Fourth unit..lasted two months and now it's not charging.  Don't be stupid like me, don't buy it.  This model is pure junk.

Reviews.Title: Disappointed
Reviews.Author: Mom MD
Reviews.Content: We bought this monitor to use in two rooms. We never could get sound to cycle through both rooms reliably so had to use regular monitors with this to make sure we heard our kids crying. Also, the jack where it plugs into the base broke so that it no longer charges. We tried using another cord and it still won't charge. This broke just after a year so warranty is out. What a waste of money for only 1 year of use.

Reviews.Title: So so
Reviews.Author: Rebekah
Reviews.Content: When I bought this over a year ago, I was HIGHLY impressed with it.  LOVED it~!  but now after only a year, one of the cameras doesn't work.  And what's more annoying is that the other camera doesn't stay on even when plugged in.  It turns off whenever it feels like it. SO.... YEAH it WAS cool.... but it's not anymore.  The picture feature is okay.... useless to me as I have a better camera on my cell.  So, yeah it's okay.

Reviews.Title: Junk and Poor Support
Reviews.Author: Blue Beetle
Reviews.Content: Bad customer service.  Nothing will pair and nothing will work.  Customer service people are arrogant.  All around bad gear, bad people and a waste of time effort and money.General wait time on call 10 minutes.Company loses registration info.Support people are reading off of a script and have no idea what they are saying.Should be ZERO for rating

Reviews.Title: Not sure what to compare it to.
Reviews.Author: Jesse D. Walker
Reviews.Content: I haven't had any other baby monitors. So I'm not sure how this could compare to others, but I found it easy to figure out and use, and pretty handy. The screen is a little small on the viewing device, and I wish the camera came with more mounting options (maybe a clamp to attach it to the side of a crib or playpen, or on a mobile up above the baby somewhere). I found it hard to find perfect places to put it. But it worked. Battery life seems okay. I appreciate the infrared mode where it can illuminate the kid on video without actually shining a visible light out.Anyway, it's handy. It's now a couple years old and not still being sold on Amazon (at the moment), so better options likely exist.

Reviews.Title: I wish it wasn't so...
Reviews.Author: not a fan
Reviews.Content: I am begrudgingly writing this review as I was at first a very enthusiastic customer. We were in need of a baby monitoring system that allowed for multiple viewings (we have three children) and could handle long ranges. The product fit the bill and initially performed great. Until...the charging piece in the monitor kept breaking off effectively making it useless since it could no longer charge on the docking station. We are now onto our fourth replacement monitor as we have invested a lot of money into the systems and cameras amongst our multiple residences.The latest interaction with Lorex has left me incredibly frustrated and disappointed. The customer service department is abysmal. Upon returning two broken monitors at our cost, they not only claimed never to receive them (two separate times - thank goodness for FedEx confirmation #) but they only mailed one replacement, not two. After calling and speaking to the apparent head of customer service (Joe Lee) he then accused us of lying and promised to investigate and call back which he never did.BOTTOM LINE - FAULTY PRODUCT, HORRIBLE CUSTOMER SERVICE AND SUPPORT!!

Reviews.Title: Priceless to wothless
Reviews.Author: Donna Sharp
Reviews.Content: We purchased this monitor for our daughter and son in law for Christmas.  Initially it worked well.  In May it stopped working for no apparent reason.  It had not been misused or abused.  My daughter contacted the company directly to get a replacement or do an exchange.  She was told it's not their problem.  I would discourage anyone from purchasing anything from this company.  They do not stand behind their products.

Reviews.Title: Have had it 2 years and still love it!!
Reviews.Author: octoberjackie
Reviews.Content: We have had this monitor for 2 years now and just love it. It works great, and we love that we can not only see our son, but talk and take pics of him too! The only reason I gave 4 instead of 5 stars is because the pictures are not as clear as advertised, but they are still quite legible. Battery life is still great and we can't imagine not having a video monitor. We are now purchasing a second camera for our new baby's room and plan to use it for years to come.

Reviews.Title: Junk - Buy a DropCam instead
Reviews.Author: L8er
Reviews.Content: I bought this last year with additional cameras to set up for my 2 kids.  The first week I was excited because it seemed to work well.  So I bought a 2nd unit with additional cameras for my brother who just had a kid.  Both of us dealt with similar issues with these monitors.  The monitor battery dies really fast.  We pretty much had to keep ours plugged in all the time.  We might get 30 minutes without it plugged in.  The cameras are actually pretty good and work well.  The big problem is the monitors.  Where the charger plugs in gets bent easily, which is what happened almost exactly 1 year after purchasing these - on both devices and within a week of each other!I decided to go with what I had originally wanted and bought the dropcam.  We have had no issues with that at all.  Well worth the money and you can add additional cameras.  Now we get alerts of motion or sound on our ipad or iphones or can just leave it open a  computer screen.  Save yourself the money and the headache and DO NOT BUY THE LOREX LIVE!!

Reviews.Title: Not Worth It
Reviews.Author: Craije
Reviews.Content: We had a video monitor of another brand and it kept giving out around the six month mark, so we tried this one. It was terrible. It would lose the video feed in the middle of the night and suddenly sound an alarm, for which there was no quick shut off. The picture was really low quality, so that it really only made you worry more instead of less. We sent it right back.

Reviews.Title: Works ok but have had to return twice to the manufacturer in less than a year
Reviews.Author: Sarah Russo
Reviews.Content: I bought these less than a year ago to put in our two children's' bedrooms.  Overall the technology is great.  The camera's have a clear picture and the audio is good too.  However, we have had to have the handset replaced because the plug connection came loose inside and the handset couldn't be recharged. One of the cameras started malfunctioning about a two months ago and they had me return the handset and sent me a new one.  This did not fix the problem.  I have to now return one of the cameras and it will have to be replaced.  The customer service has been slow to respond and difficult to get a live person.  I have been very frustrated by not getting timely responses and now have had a malfunctioning unit for about 4 months.  They have still not fixed the problem.  They keep sending me parts of the system and I am having to wait for replacements so I don't have a working system with two young children.  For the cost of these units I would expect a better product in the first place.Lorex LW2003 LIVE snap Video Baby Monitor (White)

Reviews.Title: Good Little camera
Reviews.Author: karen powell
Reviews.Content: This camera works well. The only complaint I have is the screen is too small. It is hard to see what is really happening. I have it in my puppy birthing box and screen is too small.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Jessica Hooker
Reviews.Content: We have been using this camera for over a year now and still enjoy it. Love the portable parents monitor, I can go almost anywhere in the house and have a signal. Will be purchasing additional camera for new baby on the way!

Reviews.Title: ONLY LASTED A WEEK
Reviews.Author: 2babes1ontheway
Reviews.Content: This product was great until it broke. I read another review that said they had the same problem.  The charging dock/plug thingy popped out from the hand held portion that plugs into the charger and obviously couldn't be used after that. I bought the one with 2 camera's. I did like the product a lot before it broke, but it broke after one week and there was no rough play or anything of the sort. All I was doing was putting it on the charger. I called as well and it's useless. I guess that's 150 or so down the drain.... I have another baby on the way so now it really grinds my gears that I have to spend extra cash on another product when this one should still be working especially for what I paid on it!

Reviews.Title: Defective Battery and Customer Service
Reviews.Author: Mr. Howard
Reviews.Content: The camera unit works fine however the unit we received had a defective battery that couldn't be charged.  Lorex customer service routed the call to a foreign country.  The agent said he was going to "escalate our case" but we never heard back.  The product is OK but the initial quality is poor and the customer service even worse.  We returned the unit and bought one from another manufacturer.  Buyer beware!

Reviews.Title: After one year - stops working - replacement is more than the original
Reviews.Author: Justin
Reviews.Content: First - this product is now listed on Amazon for $30 more than I paid for it over a year ago. The product worked well, until just over one year (which is the end of the warranty). Then it just stopped working! Would not charge. So I called tech support. They said it could be the monitor/handset, the battery or the charger... I KNEW that- those were the only options! I was offered to send in my unit and they would replace it - for $100+ shipping!!! I only paid $129.99 for the entire unit (including the camera which is listed at $92 on Amazon. That means my $38 unit ($130-92=$38) can be replaced for $100?? No thank you. I would NEVER buy this product or ANY product from Lorax again! A monitor should last at least 2 years. Save your money and buy a better brand that will last.

Reviews.Title: while it works, it works great but then breaks
Reviews.Author: Carrie Jernigan
Reviews.Content: This is the second one I have bought in a year and a half and the unit that I watch keeps breaking. Very costly seeing as you can't just buy that piece. But it shouldn't break so easily either. The first one broke where the plug plugs into it. The second one's power button quit working. Very disappointed because I loved this monitor :(

Reviews.Title: Breaks
Reviews.Author: Jennifer Patton
Reviews.Content: There are a lot of things I like about this monitor such as being able to watch the 4 rooms of my children as well as talk to them through the monitor. The picture quality is decent as well. However, this is the second monitor of this kind that I have had in the past 2 1/2 years and it now broken. Both have broken the same way. The hand held portion plugs into a base. When I put the hand held on the base the connector actually breaks off and goes up inside the monitor. It is then unusable because it can't be charged. I would consider this a defect in the product and wouldn't recommend buying it.

Reviews.Title: Battery charger is pretty useless
Reviews.Author: Melissa Carmona
Reviews.Content: Luckily it came with two camera chargers and the docking charger.  Mobility is awesome, but the fact that the cameras lose power if not plugged in is a bummer.  Gave it 4 stars because we constantly have everything plugged in.

Reviews.Title: Battery WILL die on you
Reviews.Author: J. Plooy "Proud Parent"
Reviews.Content: Honestly, don't put the money into this product, the "rechargeable" battery will die. It is not easy to use. The special features are not Impressive. I would look elsewhere for a baby monitor. This barely lasted us 6 months. That is not exactly what we had hoped for. Disappointed.

Reviews.Title: stopped working after 4 months
Reviews.Author: snamccloy
Reviews.Content: I liked the product for a while, didn't care for how bright the lights are when charging or in use, my daughter is so visual at night if she saw it it would wake her up even more. I was extremely disappointed when after 4 1/2 months it just stopped working all together. I expected with the price point a more quality product.

Reviews.Title: Just ok
Reviews.Author: first time mommy
Reviews.Content: We had this monitor and it worked ok for a little over a year. The little attachment that hooks the monitor to the charging cradle broke, and will no longer charge. Here are the pros and cons of it, while it worked...pros:- pretty decent video quality, day or night vision- didn't experience any interference with any other wireless devices we had- able to hook up to 4 cameras, we've only tried 2 and they worked wellcons:- cheaply made, as I said, the charging piece on the monitor broke and is now useless- battery on camera is terrible, it would run out of battery power in the middle of the night. What's the point of a monitor that won't watch your baby the whole night?? We had to keep it plugged in all the time and mount it on a wall close to a plug, which meant that it was a little further from the crib than I'd like (harder to see baby).- vox feature that is supposed to only turn the monitor on if it detects noise. had it set per the conditions in the manual. the monitor just turned on and off at regular intervals- very annoying when trying to sleep while the baby is sleeping and not making any noise to turn it on.- features that added to the price that I did not find useful- camera (not great quality), talk to baby- I just found it weird and didn't think my baby would like to hear me but not see me, so I just never used it. We tried it once and it worked fine, it's just something I could do without.Overall, I thought this video monitor was good enough not to return for the year we had it. But I will be looking for another monitor now that this one's done.

Reviews.Title: Do not buy, have had issues every 6 months with this product
Reviews.Author: sweetie25
Reviews.Content: This unit did what we needed it to do and since we have twins, we had to get the 2 camera unit.  Well within 4 months, the plug in port on the bottom of the monitor broke so that we couldn't charge the hand held monitor.  The port that the base plugs into literally came unglued and went up into the monitor itself.  We had no problems with the unit and thought it worked well enough for what we needed.  So we returned and got a new one, thinking this was a fluke or just a bad one.  Nope, within 6 months, the other one did the same thing.  Lorex "fixed" it after waiting 2-3 weeks to get the unit back, it did it again after another 6 months or so.  We are on our 4th one after being fixed and it has broken again.  I'm done with trying to fix this product and being without a monitor for weeks, waiting for them to fix the same problem over and over again.  I hope our new monitor will last longer than 6 months without having to be returned to be repaired.

Reviews.Title: Quit working 3 days after the return period expired
Reviews.Author: erika Miller
Reviews.Content: We had high hopes for this camera. It worked well for a short period of time. Then it started cutting in and out of view. Shortly after that it quit working altogether. We went on Amazon to see if we could return it and the time period expired a couple days earlier. Very disappointed that we only got a few weeks use out of this before it broke - at this price it should last much longer.

Reviews.Title: Does the job, but not well
Reviews.Author: jtenminusone
Reviews.Content: We have owned this monitor for a year now.  Our Summer Infant video monitor mysteriously went missing at the hands of our 1YO and we needed to replace it.  For the price, this is an excellent deal.  We have a camera in our two boys' room and one in our baby daughter's.  I love that we can switch between both cameras.  I also love the "talk back" feature as well as the ability to unplug the camera and move it to a different room without plugging it back in for a while, features our old unit did not have.  While I can hear the sound well and can see the picture, it doesn't have the best picture quality.  Also, our one camera has more sound feedback than the other, you can tell just from the background noise which room it's currently on.  The handheld unit is also made of cheap plastic.  I dropped it once and it's rattled ever since.  But we have it a year and it's still going strong!

Reviews.Title: DO NOT BUY THIS!
Reviews.Author: Sarah
Reviews.Content: If you're like me, you read reviews before buying.  Well, read this one!  BUYER BEWARE! If it was possible to rate it 0 stars, I would have.  I have had this monitor going on 2 years now for my twins.  However, it's not the original monitor because it's been replaced not once, not twice, not three times...but FOUR TIMES!!!  The Lorex customer service is horrible, the turn around time for replacement is awful and the handheld monitor is terrible.  The piece that connects it to the dock has broken off all 4 times.  It looks cheap and feels cheap.  Do yourself a favor and skip this one and spend a little more on another brand.

Reviews.Title: It works well, but issues with USB
Reviews.Author: DH
Reviews.Content: The monitor works well, but after 6 months we had issues with the USB. One night I went to set the monitor into the base to charge and the USB in the monitor pushed up. It became loose and I wasn't able to connect it to the base to charge.I called Lorex and it seemed like this was a known issue. The customer service rep was really nice and replaced the monitor with a refurbished one for $30.00 Only down side was, I had to mail out my broken monitor and once they recieved & processed it, they send out the refurbished one. So we were without a baby monitor for about 2 1/2 weeks. But overall great customer service, even without my reciept.

Reviews.Title: Annoyed with the main monitor
Reviews.Author: rachellynn8806
Reviews.Content: I have tried now three of these monitors 1 used and 2 new thinking I was doing something wrong when charging the monitor. I have now come to the conclusion that this base and monitor is just poorly made. I am so annoyed because I love the video monitors in my boys rooms but because of the charging port constantly messing up I go a few days at a time with no monitor and with a 2yr old and a 5 month old thats trouble some! I guess I now get the privelegde of finding something better! Good luck to anyone that tries these monitors!

Reviews.Title: Cheap quality
Reviews.Author: l.lee
Reviews.Content: I am very disappointed in this baby monitor. I bought this about a year ago and in the one year, I've had to send it in twice to get it replaced and now it's broken again for the third time. The funny thing is, it's the same part that keeps breaking. The charger port on the handheld gets loose and then gets lost inside the device, which means my handheld device is no longer chargeable and unusable. My warranty is over and I'm now stuck with a baby monitor that does not work.

Reviews.Title: works great, for a while.....
Reviews.Author: daycaremomma
Reviews.Content: I bought this monitor and also purchased add-on cameras for my in-home daycare. At first I thought it was the best thing in the world. Now, after only having it for about 5 months, the piece where it connects to charge broke. I tried to take it apart myself to fix it, but couldn't. Sounds like I'm not the only one with this problem. Seems the company is aware of the problem and doesn't seem to care. I'm not even going to bother calling customer service as it sounds like nobody else has much luck going that route. As much as I hate to do it, I think I am going to start all over with another system, maybe a Motorola.  VERY DISAPPOINTED!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Great monitor---terrible battery
Reviews.Author: kesweetpea
Reviews.Content: WE like the monitor fine. It does great for our two kids. But we have been using it about 9 months and the battery on the monitor is terrible. It used to last off the base for 2+ hours and now its 15 minutes tops.

Reviews.Title: Lasted about a year
Reviews.Author: love it
Reviews.Content: This product is really awesome.  We've had it for almost a year.  The level can get really loud if you want it to be.  The screen is good and it has night vision.  Unfortunately, the charging part on our video monitor was broken by our toddler son.  But if my son hadn't gotten his hands on it than i'm sure it would've had a long life.

Reviews.Title: Very good, but the power adapter could be an Issue
Reviews.Author: danielvilla
Reviews.Content: Overall:Very good, I really recommend this Baby Monitor, by far is the best choice in the range of prices, just be careful when you place the handheld on the charging station and  don't expect a good pic using the snapshot function.Pros:The Video quality is very goodThe Walkie-talkie function is great when you need to chat with MomThe USB port is compatible with old BB chargersVery Compact and easy to operateThe Night vision works very wellCons:Is hard to stand on the charging station, actually I break a connector trying to place the handheld on the base at midnight when the baby started to cry.The Battery doesn't last so much, in my case 1 hour Max.The range is acceptable, but is reduced if other Wireless device are on the areaThe Snapshot quality is extremely poor

Reviews.Title: do not buy
Reviews.Author: miranda
Reviews.Content: I have had this baby monitor for less than a year and the first monitor stopped working so Lorex sent me another monitor. Now my second monitor has stopped working. I'm buying a different monitor from a different company seeing as my daughter jumped out of her crib tonight and i couldn't prevent it since i have no monitor

Reviews.Title: Love the features, hate the charging plugin and customer service
Reviews.Author: Heath W Norton
Reviews.Content: I would give this video monitor a 5 star review on features.  It has great clarity, charge lasts a long time on the cameras and the monitor, being able to sing to my baby back to sleep through the monitor is priceless at 2am...etc.However, we are on our second one and have had the same thing break twice.  The usb connect on the monitor that sets into the cradle is held by a tiny bit of solder.  When that breaks the unit is useless.  This connector is the same for the plugs on the cameras and we have had that break as well on the plug.  We were within one year of purchase on the second unit and so Lorex sent a new plug and monitor under the warranty.  However, we called and they will NOT expedite shipping.  So I have a baby and toddler who have bedrooms upstairs and we are downstairs and can't hear when they scream.  You tell me that 4 or more days of going without a monitor is OK.  Their customer service was rude when I asked them to send it faster and they required a deposit for us to have it shipped before we sent back the broken one.  They accused us of dropping it as well.  Given that there are 75+ reviews on here with similar problems I think they need to get their act together and fix this issue.  It would hands down be the best monitor if not for these issues, and we have tried at least 6 different ones!So happy and very frustrated at the same time!

Reviews.Title: Bad charging port on monitor
Reviews.Author: Anna
Reviews.Content: Product had been working just fine for 11 months when suddenly the charging port on the monitor became loose and lost in the device. I was about to order another monitor (which comes with a camera) since I already invested in two cameras but luckily read reviews with complaints about the same issue. Although the product worked well for the past 11 months, I don't want to risk a new monitor breaking again which apparently is a common problem...some breaking in as little as 30 days per a review. Hopefully the manufacturer will fix this major glitch.HUGE CON: faulty charging portPRO: multiple cameras can be viewed on a single monitor screen

Reviews.Title: Not the best monitor out there
Reviews.Author: Momof2
Reviews.Content: This product I would NOT recommend if you are looking for a high quality monitor.  We purchased this item in December 2011 and its already broken and beyond repair.  The actual monitor, some of the screws and pieces inside came out, and completely broke.  The mechanism inside the actual monitor that charges the monitor broke loose and came completey out.  No idea how since we are always very careful with the monitor as they are not cheap.  The charging dock is very flimsy, and the picture quality could be a lot better for the price. We will NOT buy Lorex again, very disappointed and now get to spend more money on a new monitor after only 7 months.  Please be careful when purchasing this monitor!

Reviews.Title: Poor construction
Reviews.Author: Paul A. Albanese
Reviews.Content: When we initially got this monitor we thought it was the best, we told everyone about it.  However after 3 months the plug on the monitor broke- just fell into the monitor.  We quickly exchanged it and happened again! We are now on our third monitor in one year, and you guessed it- the same thing happened!!! Needless to say I am very upset and don't recommend this to anyone anymore.  I am now dealing directly with Lorex and the exchange process so far has not been easy.

Reviews.Title: There are a lot of flaws...
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I read many reviews before purchasing this product and had really high hopes that it would be the perfect monitor for us, but it is in fact far from perfect. With that being said, I did keep the monitor and I use it for some of its features because I frankly can't find another monitor system with these features.Pros:1. The camera can operate on its battery (I occasionally move the camera to the car to monitor the kids if they fall asleep on the way home and I don't want to disturb their naps)2. It can have up to four cameras connected at once (I have 3 children under 3 all in different bedrooms, and all bedrooms are far from the master bedroom and I would never hear them without some sort of monitoring)3. Monitoring continues even if the electricity goes out - of course only until the batteries die (my Sony monitor shuts off completely if we lose electricity)4. I like that I can talk to the kids if I need to, however I don't use this feature often5. This is the first video monitor system that I have ever purchased, and I like having the option of looking in on the kids whenever I want6. It easily recognizes when to switch from day to night monitoring.Cons:1. The signal is very poor. I do live in an all brick house with some brick interior walls between bedrooms, and the master bedroom is on the opposite side of the house than the bedrooms; however, this monitor has the worst reception of all of the monitor systems I've tried. I can only get reception to just inside our bedroom door, which is a long distance from our bed. Therefore, I have to get out of bed to view the monitor, and it is harder to hear if someone is crying.2. The speaker is on the back and blocked when it is cradled in the charger, making it hard to hear3. The loudest setting is not very loud, all other monitors I've used you could turn the sound up much louder than this one can go4. The brightness of the monitor is annoying, even on the lowest setting. I lights up our whole bedroom even though it is far away from our bed. We have to place the unit face down when we are sleeping.5. The VOX doesn't work, even if you use it on only 1 camera. The screen and background chirping noise shut off for mere seconds before they come back on and stay on for about 8 seconds only to then shut off again momentarily. This happens over and over continuously while in VOX mode and is just plain annoying.6. The battery doesn't last very long, maybe 4 hours off of the base.7. When the battery dies the unit just shuts off, no warning beeping, nothing...just shuts off. I feel this is the most dangerous thing about the monitor, because I have a few times had it off the base thinking that I was monitoring a child only later to find out that it had shut itself off without warning. My Sony monitor beeps numerous times warning you that the battery is getting low - a pretty standard feature with monitors.8. There is a persistent chirping noise that never goes away. I guess making it a good thing that we have to have it so far away from our bed, because this is annoying as well.9. The video and audio are choppy, just plain and simply not a continuous feed.10. There are no lights indicating that someone is crying.11. The camera cord is short, I'd like to be able to mount the monitor high and in the corner so that I can get a good view of a majority of the older kids' bedrooms but I have been unable to get as good of a view as I would like.So although I have a video monitor in each of the kids' rooms so that I can look in on them if I want to; I actually monitor the baby with my sony audio monitor, which has awesome sound pick-up and a great voice activated system. I would not recommend using this monitor solely for any baby under 1 because you frankly can't hear them well enough. I use it for my older kids because they sleep through the night and I basically just need to look in at them to make sure they are asleep in their beds, and to see when they are awake in the morning. A pretty expensive investment for something that can't meet all of my needs. I wouldn't recommend this product, unless you are like me and need a few of the features that you can't find in any other monitor.

Reviews.Title: Works great.. tons of features I wish it had
Reviews.Author: Krystal2011 "Krystal"
Reviews.Content: Okay, so I've been using this monitor with two cameras for over a year now since my son was born.Pros:Tiny handheld monitorAbility to hook up to 4 cameras for us paranoidnightvision a mustturns up really loud for while showering or doing the lawnThere is a sound icon that shows the noise the baby is making without you having to hear it..handy at night or during meetings.Cons: (Additional features I wish it had)Headset jack! My husband has no wish to hear the baby stir ever other hour, but I do.Battery lasts (on monitor) for about 2 hours. It should be way longer, this thing requires no energy.I wish it had a temperature reading of the room abilityI wish I could stream the feed to my smart phone for when babysitter is watching baby!!!I wish it had the ability to put batteries in it for when  you are not near a plug, or especially when the power goes out! DUHI wish it had a built in movement monitorThe camera and ability to take pictures is a joke, the pics are crap.Overall it works as described, but there are tons of features I know NOW (that my son is 1) that I must have for the next one. I'll ultimatley be returning this and getting a different one for the next baby. I haven't found one yet though.I found myself additionally worried about SIDS so I also bought an Angel Montitor to go under his mattress to sense movement. I eventually returned this because either he was stopping breathing alot (not likely) or this thing was not sensitive enough to sense my tiny mans movements and it was waking him up with terrible alarm.

Reviews.Title: Worked for us!
Reviews.Author: Sarah
Reviews.Content: I love this monitor. The handheld device is small and we get great reception. We picked up our neighbors kid on our last monitor and we don't with the Lorex. I love the multi camera feature, as well as the talking feature!!  The only downfall is the handheld device doesn't stay charged very long when off the docking station. Other than that we love it!

Reviews.Title: Ok, not great
Reviews.Author: Jen
Reviews.Content: Battery power stinks for the camera. Doesn't last more then 6 hours so if you are using it overnight you must plug it in and deal with the wire hanging down which is a safety concern for me. Screen on monitor is small but is ok for me. I love the fact that I can talk through it and also love that I can have 4 cameras hooked up to it.

Reviews.Title: broken after 3 months of use
Reviews.Author: Jean S. Davis
Reviews.Content: bought this for new infant and the monitor has already brokenwe have been careful with it, i I would like to return this for a refund- a piece of equipment like this should surely last more than 3 months of use. most disappointingalso having it break , when you need a baby monitor makes it moreaggravating--

Reviews.Title: Poor durability of the monitor & base (charging station)
Reviews.Author: Sean T.
Reviews.Content: Our son is almost 2 yrs. old, and in that time we have gone through 3 monitors for various reasons (all have been under warranty, but being w/out a monitor for a weeks at a  time while waiting for the replacement is not ideal).  Another broken monitor and we are moving on to another product.  If you're ok with a monitor system lasting for a year or less, then this will be perfect for you...if however you want something to last for a couple or years or more, choose a different baby video monitor.

Reviews.Title: Worked good for 6 months then broke
Reviews.Author: AA
Reviews.Content: The camera worked great until the charging port broke off receiver.  This is the second unit I have had and the second time it broke in less than 2 years.  Buyer beware

Reviews.Title: Great while it lasted!
Reviews.Author: Jennyfromtheblock
Reviews.Content: I absolutely loved this monitor...until about a year after getting it. It is very simple and easy to use. Picture and sound quality are adequate. Unfortunately, it just stopped working and the screen displays only white. The sound component still works, but I love having video also. I replaced ours with a different model.

Reviews.Title: Not worth it. And terrible customer service.
Reviews.Author: cemrice
Reviews.Content: I never write reviews, ever. I just don't, even when I have a bad experience. But I feel compelled to save someone else the time and money on this one. I purchased this Live Snap product about a month ago, and have had issues from day one. At first, I received a wrong cord for the camera, and had to jump through a million hoops just to get it replaced. Then about a week ago, the camera started acting up (showing a 3 sec delay or so and blacking out for 30 secs at a time). When it's your baby that you're using this for, this type of issue is just NOT OKAY. I called Customer Service to ask about it and express my concern, and the rep I talked to was completely unhelpful, brusque, and seemed to just want to get me off the phone. He rattled off that I could fax (FAX??? What is this, 1990???) my receipt to customer service, rattled off a number so quickly I couldn't write it down, and then asked if that was all. I expressed my concern that maybe it's this product that has issues, and that a replacement might have the same ones. He said "Umm, I really don't think that's going to happen with the next one. Is that all?" SERIOUSLY??? He all but hung up on me. I will never purchase anything from Lorex again, and I plan to write as many reviews as I have to to save someone else the heartache. They were acting like I was trying to pull one over on them, when all I want is a product that will make me feel safe and secure about my baby.

Reviews.Title: One and done
Reviews.Author: Jason I
Reviews.Content: We had the same issue with the VOX setting that was mentioned by others but the really annoying thing was that after a year it stopped holding a charge.  Then a few weeks later it would no longer charge on the base without strapping a rubber band around it to keep in in place.  The last straw was last night when the metal socket inside the monitor simply broke off.  We have owned it for a little more than one year and of course the warranty is for one year.The monitor did work well while it worked.  I purchased it from Costco for about $180.  The night vision was great.  It also had great range.  I could do yard work around to house without ever losing signal.  We had the one with two cameras which turned out to be very useful.  I am tempted to go without a video monitor but I think we are hooked.  Hard to believe when we were kids our parents just did without these little gadgets we can't seem to live without.  I just wish it was built better.

Reviews.Title: GREAT.... when it works.
Reviews.Author: Skipper
Reviews.Content: VOX (sound turns on video and speaker on receiver) was not working on the first one. Got another one and now VOX is working with one of my two cameras but not the other.I really like this thing and so I'll just buy yet another camera.Love that the cameras are portable so that I can put one wherever I need it regardless of a power outlet being there. Cameras are small, have infinite adjustability for quick placement and work great even in total darkness.Receiver too is completely portable and only the size of a small cell phone. Picture quality is superb. If Lorex had better quality control this would be a solid 5 stars for me.

Reviews.Title: Life Changer - NO more...
Reviews.Author: jnet
Reviews.Content: I wrote the review below before this camera began to fall apart. As you can see, I bought this camera earlier this year. About 6 months ago to be exact. Since then I've had to replace the camera and the monitor portion just recently broke. The monitor base, where it connects to charge the camera, was placed at an awkward angle making it hard to get on. I struggled with this from the beginning but thought I'd get the hang of it. No, that didn't happen. Every time I put the monitor on the base it takes a lot of fumbling around. Finally, last night, the connector piece on the monitor just caved in - no doubt this was due to the shoddy design. I don't understand why anyone would design this so that these two piece would have to connect at an angle?Aside from that, I've increasingly had trouble with interception. If your house it set up with wireless access, and the monitor is too close to a device like a laptop, you might lose your connection to the wireless. I'm not quite sure how this works but I'd constantly have to move the monitor away from my laptop so that I could get onto the internet. Again, technologically this makes no sense. But I consistently had to move the monitor away from my laptop to connect.The last thing that started to happen was that the monitor and camera began to lose connection. Over and over again and I couldn't figure out why. It would go out every 5 seconds. I'd have to go up into the baby's room and jiggle the camera and it would after several minutes, mysteriously start to work again.Now, like I mentioned above, the monitor is unusable now because it is not chargeable. I guess I should have waited a few months before writing my first review. These cameras/monitors are shoddily designed and built and I can't see them lasting for more than 8 months.-------------------------------------------------------Before having this monitor I wrote monitors off as just another unnecessary gadget intended to fleece anxious parents. But with a two-story house and unpredictable napper on my hands, this camera really gave me a level of freedom I didn't have sans camera. Reception is generally good although the screen goes black from time to time (I just turn the monitor on and off again and the picture is back). I love the two-way speaker function so I can assure the little one that I'm nearby. The portability is a big plus and it doesn't need to be charged too often. It's simple to use and has a lot of functionality for the price. it does have a couple of annoying design flaws with they could have easily remedied with a few real-life tests. As someone mentioned in another review (one that I ignored obviously) the red and green lights on the front can be a distraction for a sleeping baby. If my baby rolls over and happens to see the light, he's immediately alert; the next thing I see is a little open, drooling mouth coming towards the camera. The lights could have easily been placed on the back or the side. Also, if you turn on the monitor and the camera happens to be off, it makes an annoying beeping noise. This too will wake up light sleepers. The monitor already tells you that the camera is off; why the beeping? despite these shortcomings, I'm quite happy with it.

Reviews.Title: Don't love this
Reviews.Author: Elaine
Reviews.Content: I bought this monitor after a friend raved about it.  I wish I wouldn't have now.  The battery only lasts a few hours, the picture is mediocre, and the sound is choppy.  I had a SUMMER monitor before this and it died after a year, but the quality was way better.  If I had to do it over I would have gotten another SUMMER.

Reviews.Title: Know what you want
Reviews.Author: Sabrina "Sabrina"
Reviews.Content: I researched baby monitors extensively before purchasing this particular model.  I wanted specific functions, namely being able to watch 2 rooms at one time, which this monitor does and it is the only monitor that I could find which is capable of this.  Other monitors will switch back and forth from room to room but not show 2 (or more) at once.I read all the other negative reviews about this monitor before buying but decided to take my chances because of the functions I wanted.  The other reviews were absolutely correct!  This monitor is junk!  For the price it is the worst made device I've ever purchased!  Cheap, cheap, cheap.  First of all when I first purchased it the parent's unit wouldn't charge, it took 3 days before it charged enough to take it off the charger.  Second, one camera wasn't paired up with parent's unit, which it was supposed to be and it took another day to figure this out because, of course, when I was trying to set them up I had 2 tired kids ready for bed!!  It did come with instructions to pair them so that was a bonus and eventually it did work, when I didn't have the kids screaming at me!!  The parent's unit sometimes doesn't pick up the cameras so I have to turn it off and then back on again, and usually I have to do the same thing when turning them on before bed because there is such a delay from picture to parent's unit, it's like using dial up on skype!!  It so far works better when I reboot the parent's unit though, hopefully it continues to work but I have my doubts because of the poor quality of the device.  The volume is really low too, even when it's turned up it's not that loud.  I can also only get about 3 hours out of a charge up which is alright too, I don't usually need any  more than that.  As far as the customer service, that too is lacking, which again I was warned about.  I sent them an email 2 days after buying the monitor regarding the battery not charging and still haven't heard back from anyone, seems it just went into cyberspace.So, in summary I was warned, I knew what I could be getting and I got exactly that.  Even though it is very cheaply made and Lorex has horrible customer service I got what I wanted, to be able to see both my babies at one time, or one room at a time if I like too. For that one aspect of the device I am very happy with and am glad that I purchased this model.  But, please be warned if you don't want that one quality in a monitor don't buy this model I think you could get a far better unit for the money.

Reviews.Title: Baby monitor cameras
Reviews.Author: zelda
Reviews.Content: I was looking forward to getting this to monitor my elderly parents, but was disappointed to find that the cameras didn't hold a charge all night. Packed it up and sent it back.

Reviews.Title: not pleased
Reviews.Author: LiamsMommy
Reviews.Content: worked for the first 10 minutes then the video stated to lag and i only got still pictures every 10 seconds of my baby then the volume would cut out or turn off. loved the way it looked and the video picture was really clear but it didnt function as well as i hoped for, i sent it back..

Reviews.Title: terrible recevier
Reviews.Author: Lisa
Reviews.Content: This product is not something i would recommend to any parents to use.yes it may look nice and slick, but the moment you drop the hand help screenit will break.Mine did, and now I'm a mother not able to see my baby while she's sleeping, and if you're a parent you'd know how nervous that can be.The return policy is terrible as well, there isn't anything that you can do to get help from the makers if anything goes wrong.Would NOT recommend this to anyone.

Reviews.Title: It Broke After 3 Months
Reviews.Author: Fire Dude
Reviews.Content: I really liked the monitor. Very small and portable. The image quality is good. However, after 3 months the part in the monitor that plugs into the mini USB port for charging, broke off of the circuit board. I tried to fix it to no avail. I did not abuse the product. I was very careful with it and it only got used once a day. I would hope that it would last a little longer considering the price.

Reviews.Title: Average. Spend a little more on another model...
Reviews.Author: a.farha
Reviews.Content: We have gone through 2 receivers. Not happy with it. Annoying hissing sound when it is on. Receiver is very poorly made and the slightest fall or pessure put on it will cause the screen to black out. Customer service with Lorex has been awful!!I reccommend looking at another manufacturer or at least another monitor. Not worth the money!

Reviews.Title: Cheap and unreliable
Reviews.Author: Amanda
Reviews.Content: I usually don't write reviews, but I felt I should considering I bought this monitor based on the good reviews (although it was rated almost 4 stars at the time I purchased it and now is at 3 stars).  From day one the hand-held monitor would not hold a charge.  It would cut out as soon as we took it off the charger.  Unfortunately, I purchased this monitor a few months before I had my daughter, so I didn't encounter this issue until after the timeframe expired to either return it to Amazon, or "register" it to qualify for the 1 year warranty through the manufacturer.  I don't agree with having to register the product, let alone only having 90 days to do so, but I can't change that now.  Just be aware of that issue if you decide to purchase.  My daughter is now 9 months and we've begrudgingly used it (always having it plugged in - would shut off immediately after it was unplugged or taken out of the charger) until last night.  It just stopped working.  It appears the piece that connects it to the charger is completely loose.  My husband took it apart and it looks like it was never soldered properly.  I'm very unhappy with this purchase  (purchased it for $130 in March 2011--I can't imagine how this could ever be $400 regularly.  That seems to be inflated by Amazon). Don't be fooled by the "retail" price or the cute little video.  Bottom line - this product is cheap and unreliable.

Reviews.Title: Worst customer service ever
Reviews.Author: debearl
Reviews.Content: I purchase a live snap monitor.  It worked for a few months - then I had to send in the monitor because it broke.  It didn't break from any abuse - the part that plugged into the charger became loose.  I found out where to send it to and promptly sent it in (within a year) with a copy of the receipt.  It's been four months and I have hear NOTHING !  Not one word.  I've called and emailed and have not gotten any response.  I will never buy a Lorex product again knowing it will be such poor customer service.

Reviews.Title: Terrible quality of material, dont buy!
Reviews.Author: Venkatesh "Venky"
Reviews.Content: The camera and receiver worked fine as long it lasted. But it didnt last for long. After 5 months, the camera was dead because the power socket fell apart. I bought  an additional camera. Now the receiver unit is dead as the power socket has fallen apart as well. The quality of the parts is very bad. Save some money and buy a more durable one. The customer service is also not responsive. I have faxed a return request no one has contacted me for a few weeks now.

Reviews.Title: Perfect!
Reviews.Author: Ashley
Reviews.Content: with our second child on the way we needed something to keep an eye on both our kids. We purchased another video moniter and it was horrible! but then we found this one and it's amazing! clear picture in both day and night, clear sound and it gives you so many options. I absolutely love it! i recommend this item to anyone and everyone.

Reviews.Title: Love this camera!
Reviews.Author: Bob in Mead, CO
Reviews.Content: I love this camera! I have a 21 month old and a 7 month old. This camera works great! I've purchased several cameras and returned them due to them not working. This is first camera I have not had any problems with.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful until it broke!
Reviews.Author: Mother of 3
Reviews.Content: This was a great purchase for the first 3 months.  I could see both sleeping children day and night without any interference. Then, the base broke at the connection point so you could no longer put the camera in its base...making charging and viewing an image impossible. I called Lorex and they said it was no problem to send it back to them with my amazon receipt and they would fix it. I sent the base (kept the two cameras at home) and have not a heard a word from anyone at Lorex in 2 months.

Reviews.Title: quit working after about 2 months
Reviews.Author: cindy
Reviews.Content: i bought this to keep an eye my living room and kitchen as I have older kids who need a close eye kept on them. well it worked great for the first month or so, but then monitor just quit working and just hums when you plug it in and never charges. tried to take out battery and put back in and still didnt help, then tried to pull battery and let the thing sit for a week and still does the same thing every time. what a waist of money..

Reviews.Title: Owned two, both broken within a year!
Reviews.Author: Mamalogic
Reviews.Content: My first monitor broke almost immediately after we bought it. You can actually hear something rattling inside the monitor. We got a replacement monitor, and after several months, we had the same issue. However, we can still use the monitor is most of the house. If we are at the opposite side of the house, the monitor will go black and not work at all. Because of this, my husband thinks the rattling sound is part of an antenna that broke off.The monitor is very thin and will not stand upright on its own. If I am in the cooking in the kitchen and my daughter starts crying, I can't just look up and see the screen. I have to stop what I'm doing and walk over to the monitor because it is lying flat on the counter. You can prop the monitor up, but that is still difficult because the monitor is so thin.Also, there is no clip to hook the monitor to your pants. You have to carry it everywhere. This is frustrating when I am running around the house trying to clean up.The night vision is incredibly unclear and gray. The day vision is good when the lights are on. Nap time vision is just as terrible as night vision because the lights are off.I don't have any other video monitor to compare this to, but at this point, I would choose ANY other video monitor besides this one.

Reviews.Title: Get a buyer protection plan
Reviews.Author: AniA "AniA"
Reviews.Content: The monitor works very well, the image is excellent and I love the night vision. The sound is also very clear and I did not experience any interference with the other digital equipment at home. I am giving it 2 starts because the only way to charge the device is on its base, the problem is that the charging slot is very small and have to support the weight of the hand monitor and eventually  broke. My husband manage to weld it back in place and it work... for a while, however it broke again just because the way is design. So it you decide to go with this monitor, that basically works very well, get an additional insurance coverage for repair or replacement  when the charging slot gets broken.

Reviews.Title: Keeps breaking!!!
Reviews.Author: kschunk
Reviews.Content: I actually really like the way this monitor works.  The cameras are very cool.  They are easy to travel with and hold a charge for a bit and the two way voice is sweet.
