If your watching Netflix or even just browsing the iternet you cannot use the monitor at the same time.The description says "free from interference from cordless phones, microwaves, game controllers, and even Wi-Fi and Bluetooth devices." THIS IS QUITE DECEIVING. Yes your home network will "somewhat" not interfere with this product (we do get a slight buzz in the audio from our home wifi network), HOWEVER this product will interfere with your wifi network making it not work at all. We have a 40Mbps connection, and have a wireless n/g router and when we turn the baby monitor handset on our download speeds drop to 100Kbps or less. Deceptive description in my opinion.I am not sure if the interference is only on the 2.4GHz range or if all of our devices were N and we were on the 5GHz maybe we would be ok??? I don't see what Lorex says what frequency it operates on??Anyways, we bought this product before the baby came and so our return date has since past. The description claiming free from interference from wifi networks is not true and if you have a home network i would stay away from this product. Even if you have an "n/g" router and all your devices are "n" as soon as you may add one device that is "g" the whole things drops to "g" which is where there is definitely interference.

Reviews.Title: best picture, but don't get if you like VOX.
Reviews.Author: cruise101
Reviews.Content: I loved this monitor, that why I got it.  It looked good, but when I went to push the vox, it didn't work.  I had another one shipped to me, and that did not work either!  I love the picture.  The monitor speaker is in the back and there is no stand to help set it up straight; you have to balance it.  Overall, I love the picture and hate everything else!  I really wanted this one to work.  Have to keep looking, I guess.

Reviews.Title: not worth it
Reviews.Author: C. Cave
Reviews.Content: I was so excited about this item that i paid 20 bucks for one day shipping. I totally regret having done that. This camera looks and feel cheap. the camera itself can barely stand alone. no way you can attach it onto you. picture is lousy, snap pictures look awful. . I wish it had a zoom  botton and picture was clearer. the only good thing about it is the talk back feature but besides that just not worth the money

Reviews.Title: Lorex LIVE Video Baby Monitor
Reviews.Author: Basil MacDougal
Reviews.Content: I LOVE this monitor!  The picture and sound quality are wonderful.  It is so simple to use that I never even looked at the instruction manual.  It even came with the battery completely charged!  I literally took it out of the box, turned it on, and it was a done deal.What peace of mind!  I can leave this in the room with my toddler while she is playing and keep an eye on her from anywhere in the house.  As a parent, you learn that the scariest times are when you DON'T hear your child.  Well, that can mean many things--either they're being really good, or bad, or in trouble.  It's always cause for investigation.  Now, I can carry the monitor around with me at all times.  It's so compact that I can just stick it in my pocket.I don't have a little baby anymore, but we used to have one of the old audio monitors and it was aweful at night.  I'd lay down in bed thinking the baby was sound asleep in her crib.  Then, I'd hear her fussing a little bit or stiring around and I'd have to go investigate.  Most of the time it was nothing.  So, if I would have had a camera to go along with the sudio, it would have been of GREAT benefit!  It would have saved me from having to jump out of bed for false alarms.Anyway, this is an awesome product, good price, nice quality, easy to use....get one.

Reviews.Title: Rest easy...
Reviews.Author: Don Walton Jr.
Reviews.Content: This was my first experience with a fully featured baby monitor.  I was surprised at all the bells and whistles the unit contained.  You can capture up to ten photos, as well as watching/listening to a live feed.  The screen is somewhat small, maybe 2" x 3", but you can sync up to four cameras to one monitor and its very easy to switch feeds, or watch all four at once.The monitor itself is fairly simple and intuitive to use.  Its not the greatest video in the world, not HD by any means, but is fairly clear and easy to view.  The camera also has infrared settings to make viewing in the dark easy.  The monitor is about the size of a cell phone can be totally wireless or may rest in a charging dock.A huge step beyond the toaster-sized audio-only monitors of the past!

Reviews.Title: bad camera even worst customer service
Reviews.Author: Mommy Melissa
Reviews.Content: I didn't buy this from Amazon, it was on sale on the lorex website. We opened the package and charged the monitor and both cameras for 6 hrs like it said. We set it up and it seemed to work like a dream. We turned it on after my daughter went to bed and I noticed that the screen would go black and the sound would shut off for a few moments and it would repeat this all night. So I went in the livingroom which is under my daughters room to see if maybe our bedroom was too far away but the same thing happened. I emailed customer serviced and they took over 2 weeks to get back to me. They told me to get in the settings on the monitor to do a factory default on the system. Well there was no such option on the monitor. Another few weeks after that they sent me a new monitor and the same thing happened. They are horrible at returning emails and when you call, there is always many other people on the line so you are on hold forever. I would not reccomend this to anyone and I would warn them to stay away.

Reviews.Title: We are waiting our baby : ))
Reviews.Author: cinar
Reviews.Content: The video quality is great, night vision works well. Fast shipping, good quality product.We only try. Because hopefully we will get a baby on April. I will inform you after used with my baby : ))Looks good at the moment.Thanks,

Reviews.Title: Bad Night
Reviews.Author: Jorge M.
Reviews.Content: Just the night we left the baby alone to monitor left us an image frozen on the screen. Image was not real the baby was crying, while the display was asleep. turn off the monitor and lit it again and only saw a glow any more, and spent 30 days for refund. Now I have a nice intercom (audio-only and flashlight)Lorex LW2003 LIVE snap Video Baby Monitor (White)

Reviews.Title: excelente
Reviews.Author: JAURREST
Reviews.Content: Lorex LW2003PK2 Live Snap Video Baby Monitor with TwoEl producto realmente es una ayuda para el cuidado de mi hija lo recomiendo.

Reviews.Title: almost good
Reviews.Author: Pierre
Reviews.Content: The idea is nice, the price was good, installation super easy, but the reception and quality of the signal is inconsistant... I had the return it because of that...The sound cutes of very otfen, the video is lagging a lot...

Reviews.Title: Good product for the price
Reviews.Author: mary t perovich
Reviews.Content: Took a little bit of figuring out but finally got the hang of it.  The battery life isn't all that great on the hand held monitor...you must really be selective on what to view.  I'm not sure on the cameras because we keep them plugged in while monitoring.All in all, great product for the price.

Reviews.Title: Nice Picture, but Flimsy construction
Reviews.Author: Carol Roberts
Reviews.Content: The monitor has a good range (signal is strong all over our 2000+ square foot house) and the picture on the display is crisp and clear. Although it is advertised as a camera as well, it doesn't really have the memory to allow you to take lots of nice digital pictures. Buy it for its monitor features, not for its use as a camera. The materials and workmanship are a bit flimsy, with the plastic parts easy to break. Although I have not had to contact customer service, I hear it is a nightmare. Still, if all you want is a nice clear video monitor, this fits the bill.

Reviews.Title: Every feature but reliability
Reviews.Author: Triakter
Reviews.Content: We used the Lorex monitor for about four months of my son's infancy, because that's how long it lasted.It's full of features, albeit many of dubious usefulness.  The microphone on the handset?  The baby that would be soothed by a garbled, crackly disembodied voice in the darkness has problems that run deeper than insomnia.  And the SD card slot for capturing grainy, 0.2 megapixel screencaptures that look like ATM security camera snaps?  Useful for profiling a budding felon or forensic analysis of an elaborate crib escape, but not likely to fill the baby book or decorate grandma's fridge.These would be fun novelties, I suppose, if the device worked for more than a few months, had a battery life of more than a couple of hours, and an effective range of more than a few dozen feet.  It doesn't, and we've thus far been much happier with the Summer Infant monitor that replaced it.

Reviews.Title: Great Baby Monitor *but* does NOT photograph well
Reviews.Author: Penny Pinching Polly "Check out my website fo...
Reviews.Content: Had this baby monitor not been advertised to take crisp photos of your baby, I would have given it 5 stars.  However, since still photos are taken at .3 megapixels (my daughter's play camera is 3.0 megapixels!!!), the photo quality is horrible.On the plus side:I live in a large house, with just under 2000 square feet.  This baby monitor has GREAT range!  It worked from all rooms/corners of my house!  FINALLY, a baby monitor with good range!No interference from other devices.  This has been an issue in the past, with other baby monitors.Video quality is better than most monitors.  I love to use this outside while my daughter is playing.  My yard is fenced in, I stay in the kitchen, and my parents live next door, but I want to be extra cautious and be able to see her myself.  I can point this at the gate and know if anyone were to try and enter the yard.The down sides:If you need to call their customer service number, you''ll be disappointed.  I was told I'd receive a return call, but it never happened.  Luckily, I was able to search the internet and figure things out on my own.

Reviews.Title: Ok, not great
Reviews.Author: P. Lee
Reviews.Content: Setup was fine, unit has been working for several weeks, but it pales in comparison to the video and sound quality we got out of the mobicam unit we bought a few weeks ago.  Unfortunately, the mobicam stopped working after a couple of weeks, so we switched brands.  This one continues to work and it does the job, but the picture quality and sound quality are pretty poor.

Reviews.Title: Best one we tried, but still not great
Reviews.Author: ccook
Reviews.Content: In the words of Dwight Schrute commenting on Michael Scott's breath, "good, not great."  Scan feature nice.  Image quality pretty good.  Agree with other reviewers, feels cheap for the price.  Suspect these are mass produced without a company imprint and then Lorex just buys them and slaps their logo on.  BIGGEST complaint - receiver needs to be restarted OFTEN.  Audio and images get choppy and cut out - NOT an interference issue, just a software glitch I believe.  Cameras are nice.  Make sure camera swivel is good and solid and not loose or it won't stand up and move to your desired angle.  There HAS to be a great monitor out there, but we haven't found it.  Will use this 'til it dies I guess.

Reviews.Title: THIS IS THE ONE TO BUY! STOP LOOKING AND BUY IT!
Reviews.Author: kevin
Reviews.Content: Fantastic monitor. works great. no noise,static or anything. crystal clear video and audio. long battery life. very portable. cant beat it for the price. A+

Reviews.Title: Skip it
Reviews.Author: no nym
Reviews.Content: I really wanted to like this monitor. We had the summer infant one but i really wanted something wireless so that I could watch the baby whether he was in his crib, his bouncy, his swing etc. The Lorex was a disappointment though. First of all, the picture quality is extremely poor compared to other monitors. It is not even close. What's worse is that it is not easily positionable. It is very hard and often not possible to angle the thing to actually see your baby!Even if you manage to bend it to a good angle (rare) you can't maneuver it from the handheld piece like you can on other monitors. It really is very poorly designed. One almost wonders if the makers ever even tried the thing. I returned it. It's a pain to keep moving my plug in monitor around, but at least I can actually see the babY!

Reviews.Title: Great idea - not good product
Reviews.Author: MOMof3
Reviews.Content: The idea behind this product is great!!  I love the idea of the quad view!  I want to be able to see all my children at once if I want to.  the biggest problem with this product is the "beeping" that happens during the white noise.  It was very annoying when you were trying to sleep and listen to your children - and I will not turn the volume down, because isn't that the purpose of a monitor???Also this product would not work with what we were trying to accomplish (unfortunately we are having a VERY hard time trying to find a product that would be conducive to our needs).  I am looking for a monitor that I can see and hear all three of my children all night long (one child has asthma, one sleep apnea & the third a heart condition)- so to do that we had to purchase 3 whole monitor/camera sets.  When we tried to set two up - the beeping noise was more than we could bear and there was constant interferance between the two.  We are still looking for the perfect monitor set!!  This was not it - sorry.

Reviews.Title: Feeling warmer...good customer service!
Reviews.Author: Headless
Reviews.Content: Okay...total update to my situation...First of all, one of the cameras came with a broken mic...after about a total of 15 minutes on the phone, they are sending another...you get a one year hassle free warranty from the date of purchase...the company seems to be on the ball.Second, be careful with your wireless system in your house...my advice...get an Apple router as it automatically bounces the frequency around so your phones and monitors are not disrupting your internet service.Other than that, I cannot say anything bad...the picture quality is good and the mic (on the camera that works right now) is very good...This is a nice product for a fair price...

Reviews.Title: broke after two weeks
Reviews.Author: BLL
Reviews.Content: I was excited about this monitor after reading the great reviews. It lasted only 2 weeks and then one of the cameras stopped working.

Reviews.Title: Clear picture. Good sound. Easy to set up.
Reviews.Author: Kay S. Walsh
Reviews.Content: We were interested in this for reasons other than the obvious. My son was getting married and we were not sure that my mother who has some physical concerns would be able to come to the outdoor ceremony. We set up the camera to provide a live feed to a nearby cottage. At first, I thought I would carry it to the front row and hold it; however, holding it made for an unstable picture.After setting the camera on something solid and adjusting the viewpoint, the quality was much better.Fortunately, my mother was able to come to the outdoor ceremony. We didn't have to use the monitor but we were prepared!Now we will set up the camera so that my mom's caregiver can check on her at night.A good and versatile monitor. Highly recommend!

Reviews.Title: Wow this thing rocks!
Reviews.Author: Dana G.
Reviews.Content: Admittedly, I did not get this to monitor a baby.  If I had this when my kids were babies, this would have been awesome!  I use this to keep check on my kids when they are either upstairs "playing" or on the computer.  I have two girls, and I just like to know what is going on and this makes it easier.This surveillance cam shows what's going on in color.  Back in the day it was only black and white, so this is much better.  Lorex has provided a lot of information, so I don't want to be repetitive, so I will just highlight what I found to be most useful, not in any particular order: a)  Color picture b)  Energy saving modes c)  Linkability to other cams, purchase separately d)  Ease of charging e)  Ease of use f)  Volume, and volume control g)  Ability to talk to the baby/ persons being watched h)  Range is good i)  So far no interference, which is huge because for some reason, we have  interference issues w/ our ceiling fan remote (not good!) but the video monitor has been fine.I have to say that I have not used the feature that lets you take a picture, I don't think I will ever need it, especially for what I am using the monitor for.  I have seen this brand, Lorex, at Costco for a home/property surveillance system, so they are in the business of surveillance, which I think is a plus.  This monitor is compact, but not too small, and lightweight.  Baby monitors have come a long way in 6-7 years!  I say BUY IT!

Reviews.Title: What a great product!
Reviews.Author: L. Hartness "LHartness"
Reviews.Content: For 10 years I've been using audio-only monitors for my children.  They've been very helpful in attending to their needs during times when they've been in bed and need help.  This is my first experience with a video monitor, and I'm very impressed!The first thing I liked about the product was its ease in setting it up.  After getting all the parts out of the box, the user guides, etc. I unfolded the Quick Start Guide.  This gave me an easy to follow, 6-step process to get up and running fast. Note:  Although it works right out of the box, be sure to charge up the product for 6 hours before using it.I then pulled out the 30-page User's Guide to get the full rundown on how to use the monitor. It was easy to understand, without alot of high-handed technical jargon.  I also liked that it was in only one language, so that I wasn't stuck with an overly thick Guide with multiple languages.The system itself feels sturdy and high-quality.  I have every reason to believe that this will be in use for years to come, even after my child doesn't have a monitor in his room anymore & we're using it for some other monitoring purpose.  I love the fact that the system is completely portable and wireless after proper charging. This will be so convenient for us when we take out of town trips.The snapshot camera worked just fine for me-- I was able to take photos, easily remove the tiny memory chip, insert it into the enclosed converter cartridge, and then place it in my netbook computer's memory card slot.  The photos were easy to retrieve off the memory card from that point.  The converter cartridge even has a "lock" function so that the files cannot be deleted off the memory chip.  Very handy if you have some precious photos that you don't want to lose.The commands and menu system on the handset of the monitor aren't too difficult to understand.  It might take a few times of practice to be comfortable in finding and implementing what I need, but overall it's pretty intuitive.I think my only quibble with the product is the manner in which the handset is plugged into its charging cradle. Because the outlet for charging is relatively small, you have to make sure the handset is lined up *just right* when you're plugging it in.  I wish the docking of the monitor was more smooth.Overall, this is a great product.  I hope that my slumbering youngest son isn't in distress too often, but if he is, this product will be much more informative and useful than my simple audio monitor.  Interestingly enough, if you want this product to be in Audio Mode only, you can go back to that way as well.  Lorex has produced a very versatile, useful and high-quality product.  It definitely receives my recommendation.

Reviews.Title: GREAT product that mom's going to LOVE
Reviews.Author: Grand Plumper
Reviews.Content: This is a GREAT little gift item for the new moms out there - a wireless audio and video "system" to watch & monitor baby. Video camera is tiny & very light, easily mountable on a wall or simply set on a nearby shelf. System has a cool infrared feature so baby may be seen sleeping away in the dark without being disturbed (no bright light shining on their little faces). One can program the system to "wake up" from stand-by mode when baby moves or makes noises, to preserve battery life. Their is even an internal camera, with memory card, that can take pictures when baby does something remarkably "cute" when nobodys looking! Mom can now take that well deserved bubble bath in complete peace,knowing baby is safe and sound sawing logs in the crib next door....

Reviews.Title: Terrible F - bad product, worse customer service
Reviews.Author: twin mommy
Reviews.Content: Biggest problem is that this thing has NO RANGE!!!!!I walked out of the nursery and it lost the signal immediately.  Then I took the camera near the receiver and it reacquired the signal.  Not a moment later it lost it again.  I was 10 feet away and it couldn't keep the signal.Throughout the course of troubleshooting what could be wrong, I came to find that the battery does not last that long and I had to recharge it.When I called to discuss this issue with customer service, they told me that the signal should go through at least one wall.  But if my wall is too thick it may not.  The representative informed me that I MAY have a faulty unit (vice a crappy product).  He told me he would send a new one out.  3 weeks later, no replacement.  I call another rep, and they say "did you fax us your original receipt?"  Of course the first idiot never informed me that I needed to send in my receipt.So in the end, I'm left balancing newborn twins while waiting for over 30 minutes with customer service only to find out that not only are their products horrible, but their (outsourced) customer service reps are no better.Product returned.

Reviews.Title: Simply Great Baby Monitor!
Reviews.Author: Linda Painchaud-Steinman "PARK EDGE BOOKS"
Reviews.Content: The simplicity of setup and use for the Lorex video baby monitor made it a five-star pick for me. How simple was it to set up and use? Read on:Setup was ridiculously easy, which earned it the first star in this review.Figuring out how to operate it, also took just minutes, and earned it another star.Sound quality was clear (the volume can be raised/ lowered, one more star.Display was VERY bright in the night-vision mode, star number four.You can also take snapshots with it (from the display), also very easy to do, and you can also add up to 4 additional cameras, star number five.Overall, a simple, fun, and well-made product.Note: The quick-start setup guide and user's guide that come with the monitor are written in clear, simple language.

Reviews.Title: Impressive
Reviews.Author: Benjamin
Reviews.Content: We are very impressed with this gadget. It just does what it is supposed to, and it does it very well. Set up was a matter of seconds. You can use this to keep an eye on your child. If you do not have a child, you can use it to keep an eye on your pet. If you do not have a pet, nor a child, maybe then you do not need this, but you would not probably be reading this review, would you? Strongly recommended!

Reviews.Title: WONDERFUL
Reviews.Author: Zanobia
Reviews.Content: I love this camera soooooooooooooooo much because it gives me the chance to keep a close eye on my 2 year old when I put him in his room for nap or bed time.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Person
Reviews.Content: Setting up take a minute. Video and sound quality is excellent.I don't use it as a baby monitor, rather I have the camera in my kitchen and the monitor downstairs so my other half can see and hear me.  When dinner is ready or if I just need to ask a question I don't have to push any buttons rather just start talking.HIGHLY advise you to purchase.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful Baby Monitor!
Reviews.Author: M. Barth "MTB"
Reviews.Content: This is the best baby monitor I have ever had.  The setup is very easy, no cords just rechargeble batteries for both camera & monitor.  The picture is very clear and sharp.  Only downsize is I would like the monitor to be a little bigger, but it is also a camera which is really cool.  And this is a great portable system to take with you on trips.  The sound quality is very sharp, and I really like the two way audio option.  This system comes with 1 camera but you can use up to 4 for the monitor which is really great.

Reviews.Title: Horrible strength
Reviews.Author: Jenn
Reviews.Content: This camera will not work when your bedroom is upstairs and your baby's bedroom is downstairs. No matter how clear of a shot I tried to make (which meant I couldn't leave the camera in the actual room I wanted it in) it wouldn't pick up signal. In addition, the handheld monitor's battery couldn't last a whole 6 hours even when fully charged. The snapshot isn't good, but that's not what was important to me. I am extremely disappointed with this product. The range they claim it will work in certainly isn't true because I'm well below the maximum. don't buy this product. Spend the extra money and get something reliable. This is horrible and very frustrating!! Wish me luck in contacting the seller trying to get my money back or a replacement!

Reviews.Title: Unusual freatures Very good basics.
Reviews.Author: Zeb "zebra01"
Reviews.Content: The most important aspect  - is this a good monitor - Yes - good clear transmission plus the the ability to take and store precious photo's. Very good featured as night vision. The photo aspect is a unique and very nice plus!

Reviews.Title: ATTENTION PARENTS - READ BEFORE BUYING ANY BABYCAMS
Reviews.Author: Barbara Streisand
Reviews.Content: I'm sure it is becoming common knowledge that these sorts of close-circuit/remote baby cams have a huge weakness -- that is that the signal sent to the monitor from the camera in the room can be viewed by strangers/third parties who can buy a cheap piece of equipment to grab the signal from outside. I know this from watching TV shows about this. Just do your research and check things out before buying. These kinds of devices may be a breach of the very security you are seeking.

Reviews.Title: Sister Loves It!
Reviews.Author: Ms_Ladi "...just wandering the world."
Reviews.Content: Gave this to my sister to use for my niece.  She loves it.  She's been wanting to a baby monitor, and this works great.  She set it up while one the phone with me, so there was no problem there--she's not techy like me.  And she was able to monitor my niece from the next room.  She will most likely not be using the advanced features until I come to visit, so I cannot comment there, but this is a winner!

Reviews.Title: Baby Monitor
Reviews.Author: Esperanza Reynolds "Hope Reynolds"
Reviews.Content: This product review is part of my obligation to Amazon for accepting to be a member of the Vine program, a club of selected customers that provide opinions about "new and pre-released items." We enter this club by accepting free copies of products but we promise in return to submit an opinion.We found this product to be difficult to set up but attractive for its compact design. When shared with new parents, they liked its functionality and product offering but found that it is not user friendly.Its pocket-sized video monitor with 2.4-inch super-bright LCD screen and camera is an excellent offering.
